name: $addFilter
description: Applies a filter to the player.

args.name: Name
args.description: The name of the filter.

args.name: Amount
args.description: The amount to be applied of this filter.

name: $autoPlay
description: Stars a player automatically.

args.name: Type
args.description: The source type.

name: $clearQueue
description: Clears the music player queue.

name: $getCurrentTrackDuration
description: Get the duration of the current track.

name: $getFilters
description: Get the names of the filters that are applied to the music player.

args.name: Separator
args.description: Filter name separator.

name: $getVolume
description: Get the volume of the music player.

name: $hasPlayer
description: Returns whether the current guild has a music player created.

name: $joinVoiceChannel
description: Joins a voice channel by ID.

args.name: Channel ID
args.description: The voice channel ID to connect to.

args.name: Text ID
args.description: Text channel ID to attach the messages to.

args.name: Self Deaf
args.description: Whether automatically deaf the bot when it joins the channel.

args.name: Self Mute
args.description: Whether automatically mute the bot when it joins the channel.

args.name: Speaker
args.description: Whether the client should be used as speaker in stage voice channels.

args.name: Player Type
args.description: The type of the audio player.

name: $leaveVoiceChannel
description: Leaves the voice channel the bot is connected to.

args.name: Guild ID
args.description: The guild ID where the channel is in.

name: $loopMode
description: Enables/disables a loop mode in the music player.

args.name: Mode
args.description: The name of the loop mode.

name: $loopStatus
description: Returns the loop status of the music player.

name: $pauseTrack
description: Pauses the current track.

name: $playPreviousTrack
description: Plays the previous track.

name: $playTrack
description: Searches and play a track by query.

args.name: Query
args.description: Query to search the track with.

args.name: Source
args.description: Source to search this track on.

name: $playerStatus
description: Returns the status of the music player.

name: $queue
description: Maps a text based on the player queue.

args.name: Page
args.description: The queue page.

args.name: Limit
args.description: Maximum amount of pages.

args.name: Text
args.description: Text to be mapped between pages.

args.name: Separator
args.description: The text separator.

name: $queueLength
description: Returns the length of the music player queue.

name: $removeAllFilters
description: Removes all filters from the player.

name: $removeFilter
description: Removes the given filter from the player.

args.name: Name
args.description: The name of the filter.

name: $removeTrack
description: Removes the given track by position.

args.name: Position
args.description: The position of the track to be removed.

name: $resumeTrack
description: Pauses the current paused track.

name: $seek
description: Seeks the position of a song.

args.name: Time
args.description: Time to be seeked.

name: $setFilter
description: Overwrites the configuration of a filter.

args.name: Name
args.description: The name of the filter.

args.name: Amount
args.description: The amount to be applied of this filter.

name: $setVolume
description: Set the volume of the music player.

args.name: Amount
args.description: Amount to be applied.

name: $skipTo
description: Skips tracks to given position.

args.name: Position
args.description: The position of the target track.

name: $skipTrack
description: Skips the current track.

name: $songInfo
description: Returns the information of a song.

args.name: Property
args.description: The song information property name.

args.name: Position
args.description: The position of the song to get the information from.

name: $stopPlayer
description: Stop and destroy the current music player.

name: $stopTrack
description: Stops the current track.

name: $voiceLatency
description: Returns the latency of the voice channel the bot is in.
